title: There is No "Hope"
itunes:title: There is No "Hope"
itunes:subtitle: Get ready to unfu*k the new year! Gary's carving up the annual tradition of making New Year's Resolutions.
description:
Don't be fooled, Gary's not going through an existential crisis. Quite to the contrary - he's carving up the annual tradition of making New Year's Resolutions to give you the keys to real, significant life change. That's right, we're unfu*king 2021! So, join Gary for a powerful exercise in creating the future you want, and find out his answers to these questions from the Nation:


  • Is the idea of finding your vocation valid or is it voodoo?
  • Should I focus my efforts on being great at one thing at a time, or can I find a way to multitask and win in all areas of my life?
  • How can I beat my anxiety when it comes to networking and forging new relationships?


If you're ready to take on the new year, all that and more is ahead on this episode of Unfu*k Nation with Gary John Bishop!


Are You Ready to Unfu*k Yourself for Good?

  1. If you want to be the first to know when we drop new episodes, please take a moment to Follow or Subscribe to Unfu*k Nation wherever you listen to your favorite Podcasts.
  2. If you have a question for Gary that you'd like featured on an upcoming episode, you can click here to email him directly or leave us a voicemail on the Unfu*k Nation Hotline at (646) 450-3203.
  3. If you'd like to show your support for the show, we would greatly appreciate it if you would share the show with a friend or write a review for the show on Apple Podcasts.
  4. For more of Gary's content, you can click here to visit his website or you can connect with him on Twitter, Instagram and Facebook.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
